column1: ISO Standardised Stages/Processes of AIML DEVELOPMENT / Data Analysis

column2: Framework for Artificial Intelligence (AI) Systems Using Machine Learning (ML))

column1: The first step in machine learning is collecting relevant data which may come from sources such as databases
1) Preprocessing data: Once the data is collected
column2: it needs to be preprocessed to ensure its quality and suitability for analysis.

column1: 2) Training the model: The next step is to train a machine learning model – an algorithm or mathematical representation that learns to make predictions or decisions from input data.
3) Feature selection and engineering: That machine learning model then selects the most relevant features from the input data that will have a significant impact on the model’s performance.
4) Evaluating and optimizing the model: Once a model is trained
column2: it needs to be evaluated to assess its performance and determine whether it meets the desired criteria.

column1: 5) Deployment and monitoring: After successful training and evaluation
column2: the model can be deployed in real-world applications of machine learning.
